title: Ai Transcriptor
enter_video: ENTER A YOUTUBE VIDEO TO GENERATE THE TRANSCRIPTION
stepsTitle: Steps to Transcribe a YouTube Video
step1: Copy the YouTube video URL you want to transcribe.
step2: Paste the URL into the input field on the home page.
step3: Choose your preferred language from the dropdown.
step4: Click the 'Transcribe' button and wait for your transcript!
termsIntro: Welcome to AI Transcriptor. By accessing or using our service, you agree to these terms.
